system.uses:
The Skills of a Character consist of their knowledge and taught abilities. They are tested to perform more advanced actions than that of their base characteristics. 
Skills can be advanced: Unknown (-20 to use) , Known (+0 to use), Trained (+10 to use), Experienced (+20 to use), and Veteran (+30 to use). The cost of improving a skill varies with how many aptitudes the Character shares with the skill.
Two Match/True Align: 100/200/300/400xp. One Match/Allied Align: 200/400/600/800xp. Zero Match/Opposed Align: 300/600/900/1,200xp
